name: test_collateral_is_txin[plutus_v1]
description:
Test spending the locked UTxO while using single UTxO for both collateral and Tx input.

        Uses `cardano-cli transaction build` command for building the transactions.

        Tests bug https://github.com/input-output-hk/cardano-db-sync/issues/750

        * create a Tx output with a datum hash at the script address and a collateral UTxO
        * check that the expected amount was locked at the script address
        * spend the locked UTxO while using the collateral UTxO both as collateral and as
          normal Tx input
        * check that the expected amount was spent
        * (optional) check transactions in db-sync
descriptionHtml:
Test spending the locked UTxO while using single UTxO for both collateral and Tx input.

    Uses `cardano-cli transaction build` command for building the transactions.

    Tests bug https://github.com/input-output-hk/cardano-db-sync/issues/750

    * create a Tx output with a datum hash at the script address and a collateral UTxO
    * check that the expected amount was locked at the script address
    * spend the locked UTxO while using the collateral UTxO both as collateral and as
      normal Tx input
    * check that the expected amount was spent
    * (optional) check transactions in db-sync
statusMessage: Skipped: cannot use `build` with cluster era 'babbage' and TX era 'alonzo'

labels.name: tag
labels.value: @pytest.mark.skipif(False, reason='Plutus is available only in Alonzo+ eras')

tags: @pytest.mark.skipif(False, reason='Plutus is available only in Alonzo+ eras')
